TopicTitle: Give Porkjet credit in part descriptions.

Articles.Content: Anybody else notice that in the new SP+ part descriptions, it says C7 Aerospace instead of a manufacturer made by Porkjet? I think that he should get some credit other than just in the .cfg. Do you agree? Just wanted to see what people thought.
Ultimately, that's really a private matter between Porkjet and Squad. I'd be surprised if there wasn't some sort of discussion between them around that point, before SP+ was rolled into stock.

Original SP+ had no descriptions on most parts and Lockspeed Kerman as manufacturer, which might be removed due to some copyright stuff (although we've got Kerbodyne...).

Anyway, I second that. Porkjet really should get his own manufacturer name.
The name sounds Kerbal enough, so I wouldn't mind. I don't think it's necessary though. Giving credit is what the credits are for.

Original SP+ had no descriptions on most parts and Lockspeed Kerman as manufacturer, which might be removed due to some copyright stuff (although we've got Kerbodyne...).

Anyway, I second that. Porkjet really should get his own manufacturer name.

We also have Probodobodyne. It's so fun to say.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80796-0-24-Spaceplane-Plus-1-3?p=1455570&viewfull=1#post1455570

For the sake of visibility:

Hehe that's really sweet of you guys, but don't worry, I'm properly credited! The in-game manufacturer was 'Lockspeed Kerman' before and It's quite meaningless.

As for the future of this mod, ALL of the parts are in 0.25, polished em up myself, better than they've ever been, so don't worry about this mod version anymore, it's served its purpose. And as for new parts, I got contracted to do some more parts for Squad (!) that's gonna keep me busy for a while, and if there's anything left to wish for after that, I'll likely start a new mod.

Hope you're gonna have fun with the new parts when .25 finally hits!
For such a trivial matter this is really bothering me for some reason.
